Print for an object of class 'rcongas'.

print.rcongas.Rd

Print for an object of class 'rcongas'.

# S3 method for rcongas
print(x, ...)

Arguments

x

Object of class 'rcongas'.
...

Extra parameters.

Value

Nothing.

Examples


x = Rcongas::congas_example

print(x)
